snippet: Three days into his new job as Seattle’s mayor, Ed Murray said Friday that he would sign an executive order moving toward paying all city employees at least $15 an hour.
abstract: Seattle Mayor Ed Murray says he will sign an executive order moving toward paying all city employees at least $15 an hour, three days into his new job; order directs department leaders to come up with a strategy for the higher wage.
lead_paragraph: Three days into his new job as Seattle’s mayor, Ed Murray said Friday that he would sign an executive order moving toward paying all city employees at least $15 an hour.

headline.main: Washington: Seattle Mayor Takes Step to Raise Pay for City Workers
headline.print_headline: Washington: Seattle Mayor Takes Step To Raise Pay For City Workers
